body.title: Five easy ways for Elon Musk to combine his companies into a superconglomerate
body.description: Elon Musk says creating a holding company above Tesla, SpaceX, Neuralink, and The Boring Company is a “good idea.” It’s not that far-fetched an idea — after all, this is what Google did with Alphabet — so here are five ways he could do it.
